Room.Name: Advancement Room in Jerome's School for Fighters
Room.ShortDescription: Congratulations! You are entitled to advance to the next level for fighters.
Room.LongDescription: When you leave here, you can tell anyone who asks that you were, "trained by Jerome." In honor of your advancement, the school wishs to give you a gift. The business card you see here can be exchanged for one of the new vanadium forged shields, made by Kolar the blacksmith.
